thread.title: Pan could join list of biggest flops of all time
thread.title_full: Pan could join list of biggest flops of all time | DailyTelegraph

author: Corey Sinclair
title: Pan could join list of biggest flops of all time
text:
IT was meant to be the start of a new successful family-friendly franchise for Warner Brothers, but the latest big-budget adaptation of the Peter Pan origin story has failed to capture the imagination of cinemagoers.
The film, Pan , is now expected to see losses between $130 million to $150 million after it recorded less than stellar openings in North America and internationally, according to the Hollywood Reporter .
So far the film has managed to take $15.3 million in North America and $25.2 million internationally, which are a far cry from the $275 million price tag expert analysts have attached to the film’s production and marketing.
Flop ... Antonio Banderas starred in The 13th Warrior
Walk through fire ... Keanu Reeve’s turn in 47 Ronin was highly criticised
Cutthroat industry ... Matthew Modine and Geena Davis starred in the flop Cutthroat Island
Lesson learnt ... Disney stopped putting ‘mars’ in the titles of films after the box office failure that was Mars Needs Moms
Comedy legend ... even Eddie Murphy’s comedic chops couldn’t save The Adventures of Pluto Nash
